Title: Provides for a deduction from personal gross income for expenses incurred in the adoption of a child in the foster care system
Summary: Provides for a deduction from personal gross income for expenses incurred in the adoption of a child in the foster care system.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing for a deduction from personal gross income for expenses incurred in the adoption of a child in the foster care system
